titles.title: Commemorating the 125th Anniversary of the Establishment of the Pechanga Indian Reservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/3/2007--Introduced. Commemorates the 125th anniversary of the establishment of the Pechanga Indian Reservation and the beginning of a formal government-to-government relationship between the Pechanga Band of Luiseno Indians and the United States.
